issue.title: [C++][Gandiva] Dead lock in cache
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15427](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15427). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Encountered a dead lock a few times trying to lock the mutex in gandiva::Cache. Not sure how this was occurring but using `std::lock_guard` to hold the lock stopped it from happening.
